Target: the Kyoto Protocol take effect by the Sustainable Development Summit ( Rio+ 10 )

text: Brasilia , 14 ( Agencia Brasil - ABr ) - In a document entitled Partnership Brasil - Germany : Action Plan , both countrires have expressed interest in seeing the Kyoto Protocol take effect by the Sustainable Development Summit ( Rio+ 10 ) , that takes place in South Africa , next September . Brazil and Germany also call on other countries to ratify the protocol and work to enforce it .
